019package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.prefs;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
024
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.prefs.NodeChangeEvent;
028import java.util.prefs.NodeChangeListener;
029import java.util.prefs.PreferenceChangeEvent;
030import java.util.prefs.PreferenceChangeListener;
031
032import org.apiguardian.api.API;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.AutoLock;
035
036/**
037 *  <p>{@summary This class provides the base for an implementation of a change
038 *  listener for the connected USER {@code Preferences} as defined through the
039 *  interfaces
040 *  {@link NodeChangeListener}
041 *  and
042 *  {@link PreferenceChangeListener}.}</p>
043 *  <p>All implementations must provided a {@code public} constructor with the
044 *  same signature as
045 *  {@linkplain #PreferenceChangeListenerBase(Map, AutoLock) that for this class}.</p>
046 *  <p>The class
047 *  {@link PreferenceChangeListenerImpl}
048 *  provides a default implementation.</p>
049 *
050 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
051 *  @version $Id: PreferenceChangeListenerBase.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $
052 *  @since 0.1.0
053 *
054 *  @UMLGraph.link
055 */
056@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: PreferenceChangeListenerBase.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $" )
057@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
058public abstract class PreferenceChangeListenerBase implements PreferenceChangeListener, NodeChangeListener
059{
060        /*------------*\
061    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
062        \*------------*/
063    /**
064     * The reference to the registry of the preferences accessors.
065     */
066    private final Map<String, PreferenceAccessor<?>> m_AccessorsRegistry;
067
068    /**
069     *  The &quot;write&quot; lock that guards the access to the properties.
070     */
071    private final AutoLock m_Lock;
072
073        /*--------------*\
074    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
075        \*--------------*/
076    /**
077     *  Creates a new {@code PreferenceChangeListenerImpl} instance.
078     *
079     *  @param  registry    The reference to the registry of the preferences
080     *      accessors.
081     *  @param  lock    The lock that guards the access to the properties.
082     */
083    protected PreferenceChangeListenerBase( final Map<String, PreferenceAccessor<?>> registry, final AutoLock lock )
084    {
085        m_AccessorsRegistry = Map.copyOf( requireNonNullArgument( registry, "registry" ) );
086        m_Lock = requireNonNullArgument( lock, "lock" );
087    }   //  PreferenceChangeListenerImpl()
088
089        /*---------*\
090    ====** Methods **==========================================================
091        \*---------*/
092    /**
093     *  {@inheritDoc}
094     */
095    @Override
096    public abstract void childAdded( final NodeChangeEvent event );
097
098    /**
099     *  {@inheritDoc}
100     */
101    @Override
102    public abstract void childRemoved( final NodeChangeEvent event );
103
104    /**
105     *  <p>{@summary Returns a reference to the lock instance.} This does
106     *  <i>not</i> trigger the lock!</p>
107     *  <p>Use this method like this:</p>
108     *  <pre><code>  …
109     *  final var lock = getLockInstance();
110     *  lock.execute( () -> doSomething() );
111     *  …</code></pre>
112     *
113     *  @return The lock instance.
114     */
115    protected final AutoLock getLockInstance() { return m_Lock; }
116
117    /**
118     *  <p>{@summary Locks the connected configuration bean for writing.}</p>
119     *  <p>Use this method like this:</p>
120     *  <pre><code>  …
121     *  try( final var ignore = lock() )
122     *  {
123     *      // Add here whatever needs to be done …
124     *  }
125     *  …</code></pre>
126     *
127     *  @return The locked lock.
128     */
129    protected final AutoLock lock()
130    {
131        final var retValue = m_Lock.lock();
132
133        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
134        return retValue;
135    }   //  lock()
136
137    /**
138     *  {@inheritDoc}
139     */
140    @Override
141    public abstract void preferenceChange( final PreferenceChangeEvent event );
142
143    /**
144     *  Provides a reference to the registry for the
145     *  {@linkplain PreferenceAccessor accessors}. The key for the map is the
146     *  preferences key, <i>not</i> the property name!
147     *
148     *  @return A reference to the accessor registry.
149     */
150    protected final Map<String,PreferenceAccessor<?>> registry() { return m_AccessorsRegistry; }
151
152    /**
153     *  Retrieves the accessor for the given {@code Preferences} key.
154     *
155     *  @param  key The key.
156     *  @return An instance of
157     *      {@link Optional}
158     *      that holds the accessor.
159     */
160    protected final Optional<PreferenceAccessor<?>> retrieveAccessor( final String key )
161    {
162        Optional<PreferenceAccessor<?>> retValue = Optional.empty();
163        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( key ) )
164        {
165            retValue = Optional.ofNullable( m_AccessorsRegistry.get( key ) );
166        }
167
168        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
169        return retValue;
170    }   //  retrieveAccessor()
171}
172//  class PreferenceChangeListenerImpl
173
174/*
175 *  End of File
176 */
